feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.8.0
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.8.0

Breaking Changes

  • Fix: remove admin.logentry perm, use admin (staff) status @shamoon (#6380)

Notable Changes

  • Feature: global search, keyboard shortcuts / hotkey support @shamoon (#6449)
  • Feature: custom fields filtering \& bulk editing @shamoon (#6484)
  • Feature: customizable fields display for documents, saved views \& dashboard widgets @shamoon (#6439)
  • Feature: document history (audit log UI) @shamoon (#6388)
  • Chore: Convert the consumer to a plugin @stumpylog (#6361)

Features

  • Feature: global search, keyboard shortcuts / hotkey support @shamoon (#6449)
  • Feature: customizable fields display for documents, saved views \& dashboard widgets @shamoon (#6439)
  • Feature: document history (audit log UI) @shamoon (#6388)
  • Enhancement: refactor monetary field @shamoon (#6370)
  • Chore: Convert the consumer to a plugin @stumpylog (#6361)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: always check workflow filter_mailrule if set @shamoon (#6474)
  • Fix: use responsive tables for management lists @DlieBG (#6460)
  • Fix: password reset done template @shamoon (#6444)
  • Fix: show message on empty group list @DlieBG (#6393)
  • Fix: remove admin.logentry perm, use admin (staff) status @shamoon (#6380)
  • Fix: dont dismiss active alerts on "dismiss completed" @shamoon (#6364)
  • Fix: Allow lowercase letters in monetary currency code field @shamoon (#6359)
  • Fix: Allow negative monetary values with a current code @stumpylog (#6358)
  • Fix: add timezone fallback to install script @Harald-Berghoff (#6336)

Maintenance

  • Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 in the actions group @dependabot (#6541)

Dependencies

10 changes - Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 in the actions group @dependabot ([#6541](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6541)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ejs from 3.1.9 to 3.1.10 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6540](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6540)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 13 updates @dependabot ([#6539](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6539)) - Chore(deps): Bump python-ipware from 2.0.3 to 3.0.0 in the major-versions group @dependabot ([#6468](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6468)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6466](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6466)) - Chore: Updates Docker bundled QPDF to 11.9.0 @stumpylog ([#6423](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6423)) - Chore(deps): Bump gunicorn from 21.2.0 to 22.0.0 @dependabot ([#6416](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6416)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 11 updates @dependabot ([#6405](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6405)) - Chore(deps): Bump idna from 3.6 to 3.7 @dependabot ([#6377](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6377)) - Chore(deps): Bump tar from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6373](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6373))

All App Changes

23 changes - Feature: global search, keyboard shortcuts / hotkey support @shamoon ([#6449](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6449)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ejs from 3.1.9 to 3.1.10 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6540](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6540)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 13 updates @dependabot ([#6539](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6539)) - Chore: Hand craft SQL queries @stumpylog ([#6489](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6489)) - Feature: custom fields filtering \& bulk editing @shamoon ([#6484](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6484)) - Feature: customizable fields display for documents, saved views \& dashboard widgets @shamoon ([#6439](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6439)) - Chore(deps): Bump python-ipware from 2.0.3 to 3.0.0 in the major-versions group @dependabot ([#6468](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6468)) - Feature: document history (audit log UI) @shamoon ([#6388](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6388)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6466](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6466)) - Fix: always check workflow `filter_mailrule` if set @shamoon ([#6474](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6474)) - Fix: use responsive tables for management lists @DlieBG ([#6460](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6460)) - Fix: password reset done template @shamoon ([#6444](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6444)) - Enhancement: refactor monetary field @shamoon ([#6370](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6370)) - Enhancement: improve layout, button labels for custom fields dropdown @shamoon ([#6362](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6362)) - Chore: Convert the consumer to a plugin @stumpylog ([#6361](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6361)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 11 updates @dependabot ([#6405](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6405)) - Enhancement: Hide columns in document list if user does not have permissions @theomega ([#6415](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6415)) - Fix: show message on empty group list @DlieBG ([#6393](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6393)) - Fix: remove admin.logentry perm, use admin (staff) status @shamoon ([#6380](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6380)) - Chore(deps): Bump tar from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6373](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6373)) - Fix: dont dismiss active alerts on "dismiss completed" @shamoon ([#6364](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6364)) - Fix: Allow lowercase letters in monetary currency code field @shamoon ([#6359](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6359)) - Fix: Allow negative monetary values with a current code @stumpylog ([#6358](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6358))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.8.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.8.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: saved views dont immediately display custom fields in table view @shamoon (#6594)
  • Fix: bulk edit custom fields should support multiple items @shamoon (#6589)

Dependencies

  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump jinja2 from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 @dependabot (#6579)
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump mkdocs-glightbox from 0.3.7 to 0.4.0 in the small-changes group @dependabot (#6581)

All App Changes

3 changes - Fix: saved views dont immediately display custom fields in table view @shamoon ([#6594](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6594)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump mkdocs-glightbox from 0.3.7 to 0.4.0 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#6581](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6581)) - Fix: bulk edit custom fields should support multiple items @shamoon ([#6589](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6589))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.8.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.8.2

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Restore the compression of static files for x86_64 @stumpylog (#6627)
  • Fix: make backend monetary validation accept unpadded decimals @shamoon (#6626)
  • Fix: allow bulk edit with existing fields @shamoon (#6625)
  • Fix: table view doesnt immediately display custom fields on app startup @shamoon (#6600)
  • Fix: dont use limit in subqueries in global search for mariadb compatibility @shamoon (#6611)
  • Fix: exclude admin perms from group permissions serializer @shamoon (#6608)
  • Fix: global search text illegible in light mode @shamoon (#6602)
  • Fix: document history text color illegible in light mode @shamoon (#6601)

All App Changes

10 changes - Fix: Restore the compression of static files for x86\_64 @stumpylog ([#6627](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6627)) - Fix: make backend monetary validation accept unpadded decimals @shamoon ([#6626](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6626)) - Fix: allow bulk edit with existing fields @shamoon ([#6625](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6625)) - Enhancement: show custom field name on cards if empty, add tooltip @shamoon ([#6620](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6620)) - Security: Disable `eval` in pdfjs @shamoon ([#6615](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6615)) - Fix: table view doesnt immediately display custom fields on app startup @shamoon ([#6600](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6600)) - Fix: dont use limit in subqueries in global search for mariadb compatibility @shamoon ([#6611](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6611)) - Fix: exclude admin perms from group permissions serializer @shamoon ([#6608](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6608)) - Fix: global search text illegible in light mode @shamoon ([#6602](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6602)) - Fix: document history text color illegible in light mode @shamoon ([#6601](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6601))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.8.3
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.8.3

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: respect superuser for document history @shamoon (#6661)
  • Fix: allow 0 in monetary field @shamoon (#6658)
  • Fix: custom field removal doesnt always trigger change detection @shamoon (#6653)
  • Fix: Downgrade and lock lxml @stumpylog (#6655)
  • Fix: correctly handle global search esc key when open and button foucsed @shamoon (#6644)
  • Fix: consistent monetary field display in list and cards @shamoon (#6645)
  • Fix: doc links and more illegible in light mode @shamoon (#6643)
  • Fix: Allow auditlog to be disabled @stumpylog (#6638)

Documentation

  • Chore(docs): Update the sample Compose file to latest database @stumpylog (#6639)

All App Changes

7 changes - Fix: respect superuser for document history @shamoon ([#6661](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6661)) - Fix: allow 0 in monetary field @shamoon ([#6658](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6658)) - Fix: custom field removal doesnt always trigger change detection @shamoon ([#6653](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6653)) - Fix: correctly handle global search esc key when open and button foucsed @shamoon ([#6644](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6644)) - Fix: consistent monetary field display in list and cards @shamoon ([#6645](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6645)) - Fix: doc links and more illegible in light mode @shamoon ([#6643](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6643)) - Fix: Allow auditlog to be disabled @stumpylog ([#6638](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6638))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.8.4
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.8.4

Features

  • Enhancement: display current ASN in statistics @darmiel (https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6692)
  • Enhancement: global search tweaks @shamoon (#6674)

Bug Fixes

  • Security: Correctly disable eval in pdfjs @shamoon (#6702)
  • Fix: history timestamp tooltip illegible in dark mode @shamoon (#6696)
  • Fix: only count inbox documents from inbox tags with permissions @shamoon (#6670)

All App Changes

5 changes - Enhancement: global search tweaks @shamoon ([#6674](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6674)) - Security: Correctly disable `eval` in pdfjs @shamoon ([#6702](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6702)) - Fix: history timestamp tooltip illegible in dark mode @shamoon ([#6696](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6696)) - Enhancement: display current ASN in statistics @darmiel ([#6692](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6692)) - Fix: only count inbox documents from inbox tags with permissions @shamoon ([#6670](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6670))
